Opal
Type: Material
Value: 40
Fine Value: 186
Keywords: Cut gem
Gem
Properties:
Bankable:     Droppable:
Sellable:     Tradable:

Beautiful iridescent colours shimmer on its surface as they are held in the sunlight.

The Opal item is a material.

Uses

Recipe Ingredient

Opal is an ingredient in the following recipes:

Item Name Service
Requirement 		Skills Materials
Used 		Recipe
Outputs
Create a silver opal ring Needs Basic Trinketry Bench service or better. Trinketry lvl. 10 1x Opal
1x Silver bar		 1x Silver opal ring
Create a gold opal ring Needs Basic Trinketry Bench service or better. Trinketry lvl. 20 1x Opal
1x Gold bar		 1x Gold opal ring

Job Boards

Opal can be requested from the following jobs:

Job Board Name Location Quantity Item Type Rewards
Blackspell Port job board Blackspell Port 13 +2  Erdwise Faction Reputation
Everhaven combined job board Everhaven 13 +2  Erdwise Faction Reputation
